name: Global Race Club
blurb: Global Race Club\nDream It.  Build it.  Race it.  Win!

rewards.reward: GLOBAL RACE CLUB SUPPORTER.\u00a0 Special commemorative version of the game.\u00a0 Access to monthly development update report and video blog.\u00a0 Exclusive access to the product's beta test phase. Plus, 500 random winners will receive an exclusive photograph of George Barris with one of his iconic cars.

GLOBAL RACE CLUB SUPER SUPPORTER.\u00a0 Monthly wallpaper highlighting the latest and greatest from the GRC art team.\u00a0 Access to post-alpha/per-beta test phase where you can provide general input on the product.\u00a0 Plus, 250 random winners will receive a George Barris pin.\u00a0 And all previous tiers' rewards.

GLOBAL RACE CLUB BRONZE MEMBER.\u00a0 GRC Bronze Club Membership card. \u00a0Membership has in-game rewards that promote status and performance (exclusive cars, parts, access, fuel, etc.), Bronze level engraving on the in-game Global Race Club Trophy (GRC trophies indicate level and skill are only engravable for Kickstarter contributors), PDF\u2019s of all pre-production documents and concept artwork.\u00a0 Plus, 250 random winners will receive a George Barris patch.\u00a0 And all previous tiers' rewards.

GLOBAL RACE CLUB SILVER MEMBER.\u00a0 Associate Producer credit.\u00a0 GRC Silver Membership card.\u00a0 Silver level engraving on the in-game Global Race Club Trophy.\u00a0 Exclusive GRC racing cap, PDF\u2019s of 3D hot rod models that appear in the game.  Plus, 125 random winners will receive a George Barris pin and patch.  And all previous tiers' rewards.\u00a0 U.S. shipping included. Add $10 for international shipping.

GLOBAL RACE CLUB GOLD MEMBER.\u00a0 Producer credit.\u00a0 GRC Gold Membership card.\u00a0 Gold level engraving on the in-game Global Race Club Trophy.\u00a0 Exclusive GRC hoodie, PDF of The Making of Global Race Club book, featuring 200+ pages of photos, in-game artwork, e-mails, excerpts from design and production docs, and developer bios.\u00a0 Plus 125 random winners will receive a genuine George Barris autographed photo.  And all previous tiers' rewards.\u00a0 U.S. shipping included. Add $10 for international shipping.

GLOBAL RACE CLUB PLATINUM MEMBER.\u00a0 Producer credit.\u00a0 GRC Platinum Membership card.\u00a0 Platinum level engraving on the in-game Global Race Club Trophy. Exclusive GRC racing jacket, and a printed and bound version of The Making of Global Race Club book, featuring 200+ pages of photos, in-game artwork, e-mails, excerpts from design and production docs, and developer bios.\u00a0 Plus 125 random winners will receive a genuine George Barris autographed photo.  And all previous tiers' rewards.\u00a0 U.S. shipping included. \u00a0Add $10 for international shipping.

GLOBAL RACE CLUB GREASED LIGHTNING CLUB MEMBER.\u00a0 Producer credit. GRC Greased Lightning Club Membership card.\u00a0 Greased Lightning level engraving and placement on the in-game Global Race Club Trophy.\u00a0 Original framed Global Race Club painting.\u00a0 Fictional car named after you in the game.\u00a0 Plus, you\u2019ll appear as a character in the game.\u00a0 Ten original pieces of concept and/or production art, suitable for framing.\u00a0 Plus, a Barris Kustom t-shirt.  And all previous tiers' rewards.\u00a0 U.S. shipping included. Add $50 for international shipping.

GLOBAL RACE CLUB STREET LEGEND CLUB MEMBER.\u00a0 Executive Producer Credit.\u00a0 GRC Street Legend Membership card.\u00a0 Elite, top-tier engraving on the in-game Global Race Club Trophy.\u00a0 And the George Barris insider\u2019s experience: the Global Race Club team will take you on a GRC tour including visits to the game development studio, the Peterson Auto Museum and Barris Kustom where you\u2019ll meet the King of Kustomizers, George Barris, tour his world-famous shop, and be photographed in iconic cars like the Batmobile and the Munster\u2019s Coach.\u00a0 Plus, you\u2019ll receive a signed limited edition Barris Batmobile replica. Tour includes a morning to night tear of the town (travel budget of $500). And all previous tier\u2019s rewards.
